text: David Douglas Cumming (born 1900) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a Winger. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Dundee F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: David Cumming (footballer, born 1900)
